summary: Water quality is stable and within optimal ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and plants.

insights.recommendation: Keep TDS levels between 300-500 ppm for optimal growth.
Maintain water temperature between 24-30°C for tilapia.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.034 / 7.014 / 7.088 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 324.924 / 300.3 / 331.8 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.678 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
